title: "I need him in my life" Coleen Nolan reveals she missed husband Ray Fensome while in Celebrity Big Brother
text:
News "I need him in my life" Coleen Nolan reveals she missed husband Ray Fensome while in Celebrity Big Brother Celebrity Big Brother winner Coleen Nolan and husband Ray Fensome have faced problems - but being in the show has made her realise how much she needs him Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Celebrity Big Brother winner Coleen Nolan says being in the reality TV house has made her realise how much she needs husband Ray Fensome in her life. 
Before Wilmslow-based Coleen had entered the house, she had spoken openly about the troubles she was having in her marriage to musician Ray, saying they were at “ crisis point ” and on the verge of a trial separation. 
But it appears that spending a month in the company of celebrity housemates like Kim Woodburn and Jedward has made Loose Women star Coleen Nolan realise just how good she has it with Ray. Read More 
After winning CBB on Friday night, she headed on to the Channel 5 spin-off show Celebrity Big Brother’s Bit on the Side. Winner Coleen Nolan during the Big Brother 2017 final (Photo: PA) 
And when host Rylan Clark-Neal asked her if spending time in the house had helped her clarify things in her personal life, she said: “Well I tell you what it’s done, it’s made me realise how much I do need him [Ray] in my life and I've missed him." 
She added: “Because when things did happen in the house that were hard and were sad, if he were here, he’d know exactly how I’m feeling.” 
The news was greeted with cheers by the studio audience. Coleen Nolan and Ray Fensome (Photo: The Vain Photography/Carl Sukonik) 
But Coleen added that a reunion with Ray may not be swift, saying: “But he’s in America, so he might not come home!” 
It was an emotional night all round for Coleen - who broke down in tears when CBB host Emma Willis announced that she was the winner of this year’s show having won the most public votes, ahead of Jedward in second place and Kim Woodburn in third. Read More Who wins Celebrity Big Brother 2017? 
On winning, tearful Coleen told Emma: “I can honestly say it’s one of the best things in my life. I’m 52 soon and this means so much to me.” 
She added: “I’ve never won anything in my life on my own ever. I feel really, really lucky and thankful to everybody who voted.” 
She said she didn’t feel she deserve to win as she’d been “quite boring”. Read More Tearful Coleen Nolan discovers son Shane Richie Jr has changed his NAME to support her in Celebrity Big Brother 
After the shows were all over, Coleen posted an emotional message to thank fans for their support on her official Twitter page. 
She said: "I will never be able to thank you enough, from the bottom of my heart, thank you so much." 
Coleen is due to return to the panel of Loose Women on Monday on ITV, and we can't wait to hear what she's got to say to the girls! Like us on Facebook
